data.name: 100 Large Puzzles - Animals
data.detailed_description: An extra 100 large picross puzzles of animals for the Infinipicross 2.0 game.
data.about_the_game: An extra 100 large picross puzzles of animals for the Infinipicross 2.0 game.
data.short_description: An extra 100 large picross puzzles of animals for the Infinipicross 2.0 game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
